title: Clinical Practice Competency Enhancement: Cognitive Load Management Strategies in Simulation-Based Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can improve educational effectiveness by over 20% by applying Cognitive Load Theory (CLT) principles when designing simulation scenarios.
Learners can observe their anxiety levels during mock client interactions and execute three-tier adjustment strategies (simplification, segmentation, pacing).
Learners can measure cognitive load indices after simulations using smartphone-based tools (e.g., Google Forms) and provide feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
